body_html: Thanks @ruanjiandong! I guess not super surprising, but was worth a try. So the options are still (1) split out proto symbols so people don't need to link in libtensorflow_framework.so, (2) move libjpeg to the language bindings / colocated with the kernel. Possibly (2) is easier?

body: Thanks @ruanjiandong! I guess not super surprising, but was worth a try. So the options are still (1) split out proto symbols so people don't need to link in libtensorflow_framework.so, (2) move libjpeg to the language bindings / colocated with the kernel. Possibly (2) is easier?
